interviewsJson.name: John Murphy
interviewsJson.title: Entrepreneurship is all about deferred gratification.

answers.answer: CEO of Hello World. Hello World was just an idea which I pitched at the World Convention in 2017. I won the first prize which motivated me to execute my plan. Today I have impacted more than 1 million developers through my startup.
In next few weeks, Hello World would be crossing the mark of 60m+ User base.
I haven't used social media for my product at all. But now I want to start seeing the benefits.
Word of mouth has been the best for me, no social media platform can come close to word of mouth.
Currently I am learning about Instagram as a tool for my business. Let's see where it goes.
Reaching out to masses has always been a problem.

nodes.question: What’s your current position & how did you reach here?
What will success look like for you in your work in the next few weeks?
Which social media platform is working best for your brand at the moment? Why do you think that is?
What have you found to be the most effective marketing tactic/platform, beyond social media?
What are you actively focused on learning about these days and how?
If you had the time to add one more project or tactic, what would it be, and why?
What has been your biggest challenge recently and how did you overcome it?
What is your #1 tip for a new founder?
What is a key metric you’re measuring these days, and why?
What is your biggest goal or obstacle?
